sectionCappArea: Restricted to James Scholars Program students.
sectionText: Introduction to Research. Research is a wonderful way to fulfill honors requirements. The purpose of this course is to introduce students to research methodologies, to survey the outstanding opportunities available in the College of Engineering, and to help plan for an upper-class honors contract including research. In addition to the lectures, students will also work on team projects and independent study assignments. This course is reserved for freshman James Scholar students in the College of Engineering and it fulfills the freshman honors requirement.
